data.title: next meeting
data.text:
To: cofi-tools@brics.dk

Subject: next meeting

From: Helene.Kirchner@loria.fr

Date: Fri, 4 Apr 1997 19:20:19 +0200 (MET DST)

Reply-To: cofi-tools@daimi.aau.dk

Sender: owner-cofi-tools@daimi.aau.dk

Tools Task Group Meeting ======================== Sunday April 13, 1997, From 11am to 18pm Location: ======== LIENS 45 rue d'Ulm 75005 Paris The room reserved for us in DMI/LIENS/ENS Paris is: Salle Jean-Louis Verdier Passage Vert Rez-de-chaussee (ground level) HOW TO FIND IT: ============================================================================== Rue d'Ulm 45 ==============o============~~~~~~~~~~~~~~===================================== + + | | Entrance of ENS +-------+ +----------------=====------------------+ | | | | Main building | | of ENS | +----------------------+ | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | +----------------------+ | | | +-------| | | <- Passage Vert | | | | | +---------------------------------------+ | Room | | J.L. | | Verdier | | +-^------+ X | X = suggested meeting point +-- Passage Vert For people going to TAPSOFT, TGVs start from Gare du Nord, with the following schedule on sunday evening: Paris Lille 19h22 20h23 20h22 21h23 21h22 22h23 A reservation is needed! Proposition of Agenda ===================== Tools provided by ASF+SDF for parsing, editing, prototyping. (presentation by Mark van den Brand) Annotated term format for the new ASF+SDF meta-environment. (presentation by Mark van den Brand) Interchange and Interoperability format. (discussion on abstract syntax, treatment of attributes...) Sublanguages of CASL with evaluation/prototyping/validation tools Call for proposal Contributions to the proposition of CoFI final design. Next meeting Provisional list of participants ================================ H.Baumeister M.Bidoit M.van den Brand C.Choppy H.Kirchner B.Krieg-Brueckner P.Mosses G.Scollo F.Voisin If you intend to participate but are not in this list, please send an e-mail to Michel.Bidoit@lsv.ens-cachan.fr,Helene.Kirchner@loria.fr
